name: Texarkana Flying Club, Inc.
about: The Texarkana Flying Club, Inc., based at the Texarkana Regional Airport in Texarkana, AR, is a member-owned nonprofit flying club established to serve local flying enthusiasts. Formed several decades ago, the club has grown from a single-plane operation to a fleet of five different aircraft. The club offers flight training with certified flight instructors, providing endorsements and comprehensive flight education. With a strong community focus, the Texarkana Flying Club aims to make flying accessible and affordable, taking students to new heights and offering a unique perspective on travel and freedom. For more information, contact us at (903) 452-2545 or visit www.texarkanaflyingclub.com.
